title: Puripuri Chii-chan!!
alternative_title: PriPri Chii-chan!!, Puri Puri, プリプリちぃちゃん!!
description: The story revolves around a girl named Yuuka, who encounters a being from the depths of the Earth named Chii-chan (a pun of chiteijin, the Japanese word for underground-dweller), and an alien named Ucchan (a pun of uchuujin or alien). The story follows their heartwarming and chaotic everyday lives together.
